name: Xero Accounting
description: Integrate with Xero Accounting to list, create, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Invoices
tools.description: List Xero invoices with optional filters by status, contact, or date range. Returns invoice numbers, amounts, and statuses.

tools.name: Create Invoice
tools.description: Create a new sales invoice in Xero for a given contact. Provide at least one line item with description and amount.

tools.name: List Contacts
tools.description: List contacts in Xero. Optionally search by name or filter by active status. Returns contact names, emails, and IDs.

tools.name: Get Balance Sheet
tools.description: Retrieve the balance sheet report from Xero. Optionally specify a date for a point-in-time snapshot.

tools.name: List Payments
tools.description: List payments in Xero. Optionally filter by status or invoice. Returns payment amounts, dates, and references.
